sentences.sContent: We have had lots of applicants for these positions.
sentences.sCn: 对这些职位我们已有了很多申请人。

sentences.sContent: ...The applicant seems quite helpless and embarrassed...
...an applicant with a master's degree was rejected in a job interview by an interviewer because all the other applicants are Ph...
...But schools rarely dig down to find out what really makes an applicant succeed...
...researchers at California State University asked 136 college students to review the resume and photograph of a female applicant for a job as an accountant...

words.tran: 应用；申请；应用程序；敷用

trans.tranOther: someone who has formally asked, usually in writing, for a job, university place etc
